verses.name: Matthew 14:26
verses.text: And when the disciples saw him walking on the sea, they were troubled, saying, It is a spirit; and they cried out for fear.

verses.name: Matthew 14:27
verses.text: But straightway Jesus spake unto them, saying, Be of good cheer; it is I; be not afraid.

verses.name: Matthew 14:28
verses.text: And Peter answered him and said, Lord, if it be thou, bid me come unto thee on the water.

verses.name: Matthew 14:29
verses.text: And he said, Come. And when Peter was come down out of the ship, he walked on the water, to go to Jesus.
